'''1.21.121''' is a hotfix to {{BE}} released on November 4, 2025, which fixes some bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/40877613133709-Minecraft-1-21-121-Bedrock|title=Minecraft - 1.21.121 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=November 4, 2025}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.21.121
|MCPE-229024|Subpack changes no longer apply if the resource pack is already activated
|MCPE-229246|CJK IME Interference After Closing Inventory in Minecraft Preview
|MCPE-229549|GDK - Resuming the game while another window is set to "Always on top" locks the mouse cursor to the center of the screen
|MCPE-229848|Pressing any mouse button after moving the cursor and closing a GUI often causes the Player's camera to snap to a random direction
|otherissuescount=2}}
'''Other'''
*Fixed a crash from using a data-driven renderer.
*Fixed a crash on PlayStation 5 caused by excessive memory use when stacking large add-ons.
